patterns: How do I get the user manual?
Where can I download the manual?
responses: You can download the complete user manual here: Download User Manual. It includes setup instructions, troubleshooting tips, and best practices.

patterns: How often should I water my plants?
responses: Our system automatically adjusts watering schedules based on soil moisture levels, weather forecasts, and plant requirements. You can monitor the schedule in the Control Panel.

patterns: Can I manually control the system?
How do I override automatic watering?
responses: Yes, you can switch to manual mode in the Control Panel to activate or deactivate irrigation as needed. The system will return to automatic mode after 2 hours unless you specify otherwise.

patterns: How do I read the sensor data?
What does the soil moisture percentage mean?
responses: The Visualize Data page provides interactive graphs showing soil moisture (optimal range 20-40%), temperature, and humidity. Green indicators mean values are in optimal range, while red indicates attention is needed.

patterns: What should I do in an emergency?
responses: Use the Emergency Stop button in the Control Panel to immediately halt all irrigation. Contact support if the issue persists.
